<xf:radiorow name="display_day" value="{$data.display_day}" label="{{ phrase('Display Day') }}"
			 explain="{{ phrase('Select which day this video should display') }}" value="7">
	<xf:option value="7">Unknown</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="0">{{ phrase('Sunday') }}</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="1">{{ phrase('Monday') }}</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="2">{{ phrase('Tuesday') }}</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="3">{{ phrase('Wednesday') }}</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="4">{{ phrase('Thursday') }}</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="5">{{ phrase('Friday') }}</xf:option>
	<xf:option value="6">{{ phrase('Saturday') }}</xf:option>
</xf:radiorow>

<xf:numberboxrow name="for_days" value="{$data.for_days}" min="1" max="7" step="1"
				 label="{{ phrase('xb_for_days') }}"
				 explain="{{ phrase('xb_for_days_explain') }}" />
